title: Video: Lapalux – Without You
content:
We’ve been posting more and more work from Uk beat maker Lapalux in the lead up to his debut LP due out via Brainfeeder.

The producer is really coming into his own, with his pallet finally sounding composed and resolved. Album cut, Without You, now has a video, a stomach churning mournful story of a doomed relationship, thanks mostly to the fact that one of the pair is permanently dressed in a gimp suit. Rather than taking it off he chooses to star in this music video, which I can only assume is inspired by//is real events. He should just take it off.

Taken from Lapalux‘s debut album ‘Nostalchic‘ – released 26 March worldwide on Brainfeeder.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
